subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: A year has passed, but to Vicky Hurst, it is still a blur. The phone call with the news. The few hours in the hospital, before the life-support machines got turned off. The shock. The funeral.
snippet: A year has passed, but to Vicky Hurst, it is still a blur. The phone call with the news. The few hours in the hospital, before the life-support machines got turned off. The shock. The funeral.
